languages.text: "Сразу к делу — мне нравится. Ты действительно мне долж{mf|ен|на}, но об этом мы поговорим, когда ты перестанешь валяться на полу, как кусок дохлятины".
"Straight to business — I like it. You truly do owe me, but we will discuss that when you are no longer lying on the floor like a scrap of dead meat."
languages.original_text: "Сразу к делу — мне нравится. Ты действительно мне долж{mf|ен|на}, но об этом мы поговорим, когда ты перестанешь валяться на полу, как кусок дохлятины".

traits.locale_text: "Straight to business — I like it. You truly do owe me, but we will discuss that when you are no longer lying on the floor like a scrap of dead meat."
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: “直奔主题，我喜欢。你确实欠我的人情，不过等你什么时候不像一块死肉一样躺在地上，咱们什么时候再讨论这个问题吧。”
languages.original_text: "Straight to business — I like it. You truly do owe me, but we will discuss that when you are no longer lying on the floor like a scrap of dead meat."

traits.locale_text: “直奔主题，我喜欢。你确实欠我的人情，不过等你什么时候不像一块死肉一样躺在地上，咱们什么时候再讨论这个问题吧。”
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: «Vas al grano. Me gusta. Es cierto que tienes una deuda conmigo, pero podemos hablar de eso cuando no estés tumbad{mf|o|a} en el suelo como un vulgar fiambre».
languages.original_text: "Straight to business — I like it. You truly do owe me, but we will discuss that when you are no longer lying on the floor like a scrap of dead meat."

traits.locale_text: «Vas al grano. Me gusta. Es cierto que tienes una deuda conmigo, pero podemos hablar de eso cuando no estés tumbad{mf|o|a} en el suelo como un vulgar fiambre».
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: 「早速本題に入るか。気に入ったぞ。貴様は俺に大きな借りができたが、詳細は死肉みたいに床に転がっていない時に話そう」
languages.original_text: "Straight to business — I like it. You truly do owe me, but we will discuss that when you are no longer lying on the floor like a scrap of dead meat."

traits.locale_text: 「早速本題に入るか。気に入ったぞ。貴様は俺に大きな借りができたが、詳細は死肉みたいに床に転がっていない時に話そう」
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: "Geradewegs zur Sache — gefällt mir. Ihr steht tatsächlich in meiner Schuld, doch das besprechen wir, wenn Ihr nicht mehr auf dem Boden liegt wie ein Stück weggeworfenes totes Fleisch."
languages.original_text: "Straight to business — I like it. You truly do owe me, but we will discuss that when you are no longer lying on the floor like a scrap of dead meat."

traits.locale_text: "Geradewegs zur Sache — gefällt mir. Ihr steht tatsächlich in meiner Schuld, doch das besprechen wir, wenn Ihr nicht mehr auf dem Boden liegt wie ein Stück weggeworfenes totes Fleisch."
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: « J'aime les gens qui vont droit au but. Vous m'êtes redevable, en effet, mais nous en reparlerons quand vous ne serez plus {mf|étalé|étalée} par terre comme un morceau de viande. »
languages.original_text: "Straight to business — I like it. You truly do owe me, but we will discuss that when you are no longer lying on the floor like a scrap of dead meat."

traits.locale_text: « J'aime les gens qui vont droit au but. Vous m'êtes redevable, en effet, mais nous en reparlerons quand vous ne serez plus {mf|étalé|étalée} par terre comme un morceau de viande. »
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: "Lafı gevelemeyi sevmiyorsun demek, güzel. Evet, borçlusun fakat bunu yerde leş gibi yatmayı kestiğinde konuşuruz."
languages.original_text: "Straight to business — I like it. You truly do owe me, but we will discuss that when you are no longer lying on the floor like a scrap of dead meat."

traits.locale_text: "Lafı gevelemeyi sevmiyorsun demek, güzel. Borçlusun, evet ama bunu yerde leş gibi yatmadığın bir zaman konuşuruz."
traits.speaker: Anger
